General.Name: Middle Island Resources Ltd
General.Description: Middle Island Resources Limited operates as a gold exploration and development company in Australia. It holds a 100% interest in the Barkly copper gold project that comprises 11 exploration license applications covering an area of 4,343.49 square kilometers located within the Barkly region of the Northern Territory. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 2 Richardson Street, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
